values: 做；制作；制造；生产；创造；构建；准备；组成；组装；构成；形成；产生；引起；促使；迫使；导致；造成（破坏、破损等）；实现；完成；达到；赚取；挣钱；赢得；取得；编造；撰写；编著；作出（决定、估计等）；发展成；成为；任命；委派…为；选举…为；确保；确保成功；使出现；及时到达；（尽力）赶往；赶上；（朝特定方向）走；去；前进；向…前进；进攻；诱导；诱惑；从事；进行；认为；使变得；开始；采用；择定表现；描绘；显得；看上去成为；尝试；发表；拟订；制订；促使；劝使；估计；推测；猜想；等于；相当于；整理；铺床；结交；接通（电路）；闭合（电路）；想做；说出；赢（一墩牌）；（比赛）得分；使天生合适；注定；合计；成为总数；出产
品牌；制造商；构造；结构；类型；款式；接触（电子设备的）；通电状态；<英>伴侣；朋友；配偶；（鸟、兽的）偶；<英>同辈；同等地位者

synonym.mean: 使得；进行；布置，准备，整理；制造；认为；获得；形成；安排；引起；构成

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 做，使，安排（make的过去式和过去分词）
制造者；造物主；出期票人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 正式用词，一般指用机器大规模地批量生产各种生活或生产用品。
特指按照标准样式制作或把材料或部件组合成一个整体。
普通用词，很常用，含义广，既可指制造具体的东西，也可指完成一种行为。
普通用词，侧重大量地生产出各种生产用品和生活用品。强调结果。也用于引申。
主要用于科技领域，指通过思考、研究或实验制造出新的前所未有、极为有用的东西。
多指音乐或诗歌、画的创作。
最普通用词，指任何东西的创作或制造。
侧重创造出来的东西以前并不存在，或者指独具特色的创作。
主要指在艺术或技术领域的创作设计，强调构思多于实际制造。
指产品的生产，或作品创作的完成。
正式用词，侧重指使某事发生的原因。
侧重指劝某人做某事，或指使某事物处于某种状态或产生某种结果。
普通用词，指让某人做某事。
普通用词，指强迫或劝诱他人做某事。
书面用词，多指因外界因素而使某人或某物处于某种状态。

word_group.brief_definition: 收支相抵, 勉强维持
组成, 构成；化妆；编造；弥补
弥补, 补偿, 偿还
带来变革, 发生变化；对某人(或某个环境)产生重大影响
作决定；决定；下定决心做
人多好办事；众人拾柴火焰高

bilingual.target: 制作一张关于他们的卡片。
你可以制作美丽的东西。
学生可以制作自然海报。

bilingual.source: Come and learn how to make a table.
Find a place to make your shape.
bilingual.target: 找一个地方制作你的形状。

list.abstract: MAKE（英/美[meɪk]），英语单词，作名词为制造者；牌子；通电。作动词为制作；制造；建造。短语搭配有make sure（核实，确保）。例句为：“Later, they learned to make use of annual floods to irrigate their fields.（后来，他们学会了利用每年的洪水灌溉他们的田地。）” 相关近义词名词类有formation、manufacture、constitution，动词类有earn、acquire、proceed。其复数形式为makes，现在分词为making。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course I like quilting! It's the slowest way to make a blanket!
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然喜欢了！这是制作一床被子的最慢方式！

yingyinNormal.en: You are Omaticaya now. You may make your bow from the wood of Hometree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你现在是奥玛蒂卡亚族人了，你能用家园树的木头制作自己的弓。

yingyinNormal.en: We make a tremendous amount of stuff. And I'm not just talking about acoustic guitars or automobiles or microchips.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们制作了很多东西，不仅仅是木吉他，汽车还有芯片。

yingyinNormal.en: Ms. Thompson, the transponders you make at the factory, what do they do? I don't know. I swear to God.
yingyinNormal.zh: 汤普森女士，你在工厂制作的转调器是做什么用的？我不知道，我发誓。

yingyinNormal.en: In such a traditional setting, I want to make historic British bread to which I've added a modern twist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这么个传统的环境里，我想制作有历史性的英式面包，只不过我在里面加了一点现代原料。

yingyinNormal.en: OK, come for a moment, cos I have to show you, this is how I'm going to make my radish cucumber salad, OK, with plenty of delicious soy sesame dressing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 过来一下，我来展示给你如何制作我的独门萝卜黄瓜沙拉，里面加了美味的酱油和麻油酱汁。

yingyinNormal.en: You can afford to make less. Make less.
Oh, a ladybug! Make a wish! Make a wish!
I make plenty of money! You make peanuts!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我挣了很多钱，你赚得塞牙缝都不够。
不过你可以这么幻想嘛。
你就不能做出一点改变吗？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 作出; 实施; 产生
制造; 制订; 创造
(make ends meet)收支相抵; 勉强维持

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 制造者；制作者；上帝；造物主
n. 制造；生产；收益；利润；素质；基本要素；纸和烟叶

word_family.mean: v. 做；制作；制造；建造；创造；使存在；使形成；带来；迫使做；组成；合计；共计；挣得；赚得；赶上；及时到达；朝…走去；求欢；诱奸；赢；涨；退

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 提出折衷方法；做出调整；调整选项

examination_example.sentence: They will <highlight>make</highlight> qualified educators.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们将成为合格的教育者。

examination_example.sentence: Everything can be done faster and <highlight>made</highlight> cheaper, but there is a cost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一切事情都可以做得更快，更便宜，但这是有成本的。

examination_example.sentence: Discussing the issue in private will <highlight>make</highlight> the powerful person feel less threatened.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 私下讨论这个问题会让有权势的人感觉不到威胁。

examination_example.sentence: What <highlight>made</highlight> photography develop slowly in the Victorian period?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是什么让摄影在维多利亚时期发展缓慢？

sense_info_list.zh: 作出; 实施; 产生

examination_example.sentence: Write him/her an email to <highlight>make</highlight> some suggestions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给他/她写封电子邮件，提些建议。

examination_example.sentence: When you <highlight>make</highlight> eye contact, you can feel the conversation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你进行眼神交流时，你能感觉在沟通。

examination_example.sentence: Davidson's article <highlight>makes</highlight> the point that the reason we have such stubbornly high unemployment is largely because of the big drop in demand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Davidson的文章指出，我们失业率居高不下的主要原因是需求的大幅降低。

sense_info_list.en: form or put together out of material or parts
sense_info_list.zh: 制造; 制订; 创造

examination_example.sentence: If you're going to <highlight>make</highlight> a print product, <highlight>make</highlight> it for the people who are already obsessed with it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你要制作印刷产品，那就为已经痴迷于它的人制作。

examination_example.sentence: They don't <highlight>make</highlight> countryside any more, and every year concrete consumes more of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们不再建设乡村，而且每年混凝土都要消耗更多的乡村。

examination_example.sentence: Gardens arise from a basic human need in the individuals who <highlight>made</highlight> them: the need for creative expression.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 花园源于创造它们的个体的基本人类需求：创造性表达的需要。

examination_example.sentence: The typical CEO of a top American corporation now <highlight>makes</highlight> about $18.9 million a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国顶级公司的典型CEO（首席执行官）现在的年收入约为1890万美元。

examination_example.sentence: At work, people pretty much know what they're supposed to be doing: working, <highlight>making</highlight> money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在工作中，人们非常清楚他们应该做什么：工作，赚钱。

examination_example.sentence: The best lawyers <highlight>made</highlight> skyscrapers-full of money, tempting ever more students to pile into law schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最好的律师赚得盆满钵满，吸引越来越多的学生涌入法学院。

examination_example.sentence: "Figuring out a way to accelerate that transition would <highlight>make</highlight> sense for them," he said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “找到一种加速这种转变的方法对他们来说是有道理的。”他说。

examination_example.sentence: These commutes were reportedly more enjoyable compared with those without communication, which <highlight>makes</highlight> absolute sense, since human beings thrive off of social connections.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据报道，与那些没有交流的人相比，这些通勤更令人愉快，这是绝对有道理的，因为人类依靠社会关系而繁荣。

examination_example.sentence: Knowing the results of Epley's study, it <highlight>makes</highlight> sense that many people hate photographs of themselves viscerally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 了解了Epley的研究结果，很多人发自内心地讨厌自己的照片是讲得通的。

examination_example.sentence: And guilt, by prompting us to think more deeply about our goodness, can encourage humans to <highlight>make</highlight> up for errors and fix relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而内疚，通过促使我们更深入地思考自己的善良，可以鼓励人类弥补错误，修复关系。

examination_example.sentence: Some kids who are low in sympathy may <highlight>make</highlight> up for that shortfall by experiencing more guilt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些缺乏同情心的孩子可能会通过体验更多的内疚来弥补这一不足。

examination_example.sentence: The government should <highlight>make</highlight> sure there is space for playing fields and the money to pave tennis and netball courts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府应该确保有运动场地的空间以及铺设网球场和无挡板篮球场的资金。

examination_example.sentence: Nor was there any evidence that those who self-enhanced the most were doing so to <highlight>make</highlight> up for profound insecurities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也没有任何证据表明，那些自我提升最多的人这样做是为了弥补严重的不安全感。

examination_example.sentence: To put it another way: How can we <highlight>make</highlight> sure that the thinking of intelligent machines reflects humanity's highest values?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说：我们如何确保智能机器的思维反映了人类的最高价值观？

examination_example.sentence: After a spouse has been selected, each family investigates the other to <highlight>make</highlight> sure its child is marrying into a good family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在选定配偶后，每个家庭都会调查对方，以确保其子女嫁入一个好家庭。

examination_example.sentence: If we set an end-of-quarter deadline, we will never <highlight>make</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们把最后期限定在季度末，我们将无法完成。

examination_example.sentence: Schools in the family of vocational education "have that stereotype...that it's for kids who can't <highlight>make</highlight> it academically," he says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在职业教育家庭中，学校“有那种刻板印象……这是为那些在学业上不成功的孩子准备的，”他说。

examination_example.sentence: A common name for a guy who never <highlight>made</highlight> it to the top.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个从未成功登顶的人的普通名字。

examination_example.sentence: Depending on the school, it can be costly to <highlight>make</highlight> up credits after switching too late in the game.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据学校的不同，在这场游戏中如果转换得太晚，补足学分的成本可能会很高。

examination_example.sentence: five ways to <highlight>make</highlight> conversation with anyone
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可以与任何人寒暄的五种方式

examination_example.sentence: Five amazing ways that you can <highlight>make</highlight> conversation with almost anyone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 五种能让你几乎可与任何人寒暄的神奇方式。

examination_example.sentence: The web's full of articles offering tips on <highlight>making</highlight> time to read.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 网上到处都是为如何腾出时间阅读提供建议的文章。

examination_example.sentence: On a really good day, it no longer feels as if you're "<highlight>making</highlight> time to read," but just reading.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在真正美好的一天，你不再觉得自己在“腾出时间阅读”，而只是在阅读。

examination_example.sentence: In order to <highlight>make</highlight> the most of our focus and energy, we also need to embrace downtime, or as Newport suggests, "be lazy".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了充分利用我们的注意力和精力，我们还需要接受休息时间，或者像Newport建议的那样，“偷懒”。

examination_example.sentence: Realistic optimists are those who <highlight>make</highlight> the best of things that happen, but not those who believe everything happens for the best.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现实的乐观主义者是那些把发生的事情做得最好的人，而不是那些相信一切都是为了最好而发生的人。

examination_example.sentence: The Barna survey found that a main cause for the fake news problem is journalists' <highlight>made</highlight>-up stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Barna的调查发现，造成假新闻问题的一个主要原因是记者们编造故事。

examination_example.sentence: The top reason given by Americans for the fake news phenomenon is "reader error," more so than <highlight>made</highlight>-up stories in reporting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人给出的造成假新闻现象的首要原因是“读者错误”，而不是在报道中编造故事。

examination_example.sentence: My collection of "Smiling Victorians" <highlight>makes</highlight> up only a tiny percentage of the vast catalogue of photographic portraiture created between 1840 and 1900.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我收集的“微笑的维多利亚人”在1840年至1900年间创作的大量摄影肖像作品中只占很小的比例。

examination_example.sentence: Together, they <highlight>make</highlight> up the reading component of your overall literacy, or relationship to your surrounding textual environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们共同构成了你整体读写能力的阅读部分，或与你周围文本环境的关系。

sense_info_list.zh: (make ends meet)收支相抵; 勉强维持

examination_example.sentence: Many people who are opting to work in retirement are preparing to do so because they are worried about <highlight>making</highlight> ends meet in their later years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人准备退休后继续工作是因为他们担心晚年的生计问题。

examination_example.sentence: About 72% of "unretire" respondents said that they would return to work once retired while 59% said it would be tied to <highlight>making</highlight> ends meet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约72%的“未退休”受访者表示，一旦退休，他们将重返工作岗位，而59%的受访者表示这关乎生计。

examination_example.sentence: But this seems to be the irony of office speak: Everyone <highlight>makes</highlight> fun of it, but managers love it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这似乎是办公室语言的讽刺之处：每个人都取笑它，但经理们喜欢它。

examination_example.sentence: But under anti-bribery laws, proof must be <highlight>made</highlight> of concrete benefits, such as approval of a contract or regulation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是根据反贿赂法，必须证明具体的利益，如批准合同或法规。

sense_info_list.en: manage to reach or go to a place or position

examination_example.sentence: His attempts to <highlight>make</highlight> his way up the promotion ladder speak volumes about British society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他试图登上晋升阶梯的尝试充分反映了英国社会。

examination_example.sentence: These eggs are <highlight>making</highlight> their debut now on shelves for as much as $8 a dozen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些鸡蛋现在以每打8美元的价格在货架上首次面市。

sense_info_list.en: produce a total when added together
a type of product or the name of the company that made it
to force sb to do sth

word_usage.usage: make-up是名词，意思是“化妆品；性格；气质；组成成分”；而made-up是形容词，意思是“化了妆的；虚构的；编造的”。

表示“由……制成”
be made of是指产品在制作后，能看得出原材料。
be made from是指产品制作后看不出原材料。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指“做、制造”。普通用语，包括各种手工或机器制造，也包括艺术科学方面的创造。
概念较make窄，多指由机器进行大规模生产。
概念也较广泛，既指具体物品的生产，也指精神财富的创造，可用于物，也可用于人，但强调的是数量及品种，而不像manufacture强调生产的机械化过程。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使得(处于某种状态); 造成; 引起
实行; 作出某种举动
等于; 合计为; 计算; 估计

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 带来变革；发生变化；对某人(或某个环境)产生重大影响
组成；构成；化妆；编造；弥补
取得进展；取得进步；进步
理解；发现；起草；证明；过日子；搞性关系
对某人(或某个环境)没有影响
表示歉意要离开/不能来
走向；前往；产生...的结果；被认为是；非常适合；袭击；扑向；非常相配

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 制造者；制作者；上帝；造物主
n. 制造；生产；收益；利润；素质；基本要素；纸和烟叶

word_family.mean: v. 做；制作；制造；建造；创造；使存在；使形成；带来；迫使做；组成；合计；共计；挣得；赚得；赶上；及时到达；朝…走去；求欢；诱奸；赢；涨；退

sense_info_list.zh: 使得(处于某种状态); 造成; 引起

examination_example.sentence: The researchers found that extended screen time <highlight>makes</highlight> young people less happy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员发现，延长屏幕时间会让年轻人的幸福感降低。

examination_example.sentence: Environmental conscientiousness isn't always enough to <highlight>make</highlight> customers recycle old goods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 单靠环保意识不足以让消费者回收旧产品。

examination_example.sentence: In a few decades, artificial intelligence (AI) will surpass many of the abilities that we believe <highlight>make</highlight> us special.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 再过几十年，那些我们自认为与众不同，独一无二的能力都将被人工智能 (AI) 所超越。

sense_info_list.zh: 实行; 作出某种举动

examination_example.sentence: According to the woman, what should people do when <highlight>making</highlight> important decisions?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这位女士的说法，人们在做出重要决定时应该做什么？

examination_example.sentence: But I think thanks to technology, we can <highlight>make</highlight> comparisons more easily and have more access to choice and customization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我认为，多亏了技术，我们可以更容易地进行比较，并有更多的选择和定制机会。

examination_example.sentence: What does the woman say people tend to do when <highlight>making</highlight> decisions?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位女士说人们在做决定时倾向于做什么？

sense_info_list.en: form or put together out of material or parts

examination_example.sentence: The waste has been put down to burning old cosmetic stock to <highlight>make</highlight> way for their new beauty range.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了给他们的新化妆品系列让路，这些垃圾被用来焚烧旧化妆品库存。

examination_example.sentence: The sand under the hill defeated several attempts by Higgins' workers to <highlight>make</highlight> a proper hole.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Higgins的工人们多次试图挖一个合适的洞，但都被山下的沙子打败了。

examination_example.sentence: What <highlight>made</highlight> the link from then to now was the development of wireless communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从那时到现在，是无线通信的发展建立了这种联系。

examination_example.sentence: Tell me how much you <highlight>make</highlight> and I will <highlight>make</highlight> a pretty accurate prediction about your cultural values.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 告诉我你挣多少钱，我会对你的文化价值观做一个相当准确的预测。

examination_example.sentence: They foresee this being something that could give their estates and give their families the ability to <highlight>make</highlight> money from their likeness when they're gone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “他们预见到这是能让他们的遗产让他们的家人在他们离开后有能力从他们的肖像中赚钱的东西。”

examination_example.sentence: The criticism will, theoretically, help the organization I'm leaving to improve, <highlight>making</highlight> sure employees of the future are less likely to encounter what I did.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从理论上讲，这些批评将有助于我即将离开的公司进行改进，确保员工未来不会遭遇我所遇到的事情。

examination_example.sentence: As technology progresses, we all have a duty to <highlight>make</highlight> sure that we shape a future that we would want to find ourselves in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着技术的进步，我们都有责任确保我们塑造一个我们想要的未来。

examination_example.sentence: You have to spend substantial capital in creating awareness around their likeness and <highlight>making</highlight> sure people are familiar with who they are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你必须投入大量资金，让人们了解他们的相似之处，并确保他们熟悉自己。

examination_example.sentence: This way you <highlight>make</highlight> use of your emotions without losing your balance and inner stability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样你就可以在不失去平衡和内在稳定的情况下利用你的情绪。

examination_example.sentence: A lot of actors today are likely to <highlight>make</highlight> use of the CGI technology to have their images stored for the benefit of their families.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，许多演员可能会利用CGI技术来存储自己的图像，以造福于家人。

examination_example.sentence: Observe carefully how their partners <highlight>make</highlight> use of gestures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仔细观察伴侣如何使用手势。

sense_info_list.en: manage to reach or go to a place or position

examination_example.sentence: Marconi was the first to develop and perfect this system, using the recently-discovered "air waves" that <highlight>make</highlight> up the electromagnetic spectrum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi是第一个开发和完善这个系统的人，他利用了最近发现的构成电磁波谱的“空气波”。

examination_example.sentence: The fire spread through the cathedral's roof, <highlight>made</highlight> up of hundreds of oak beams, some dating back to the 13th century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大火蔓延到大教堂的屋顶，屋顶由数百根橡木横梁组成，其中一些可以追溯到13世纪。

examination_example.sentence: Would you say then that most successful people <highlight>make</highlight> it all by themselves?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，你会说大多数成功人士都是靠自己成功的吗？

examination_example.sentence: In reality, your role is whatever you <highlight>make</highlight> of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，你的角色是你自己创造的。

examination_example.sentence: When we are bringing someone back, representing someone who is no longer alive on the screen, what we are doing is extremely sophisticated digital <highlight>make</highlight>-up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们把一个人带回来，在屏幕上代表一个已经不在人世的人时，我们所做的是极其复杂的电子数字特效化妆。

sense_info_list.en: produce a total when added together
sense_info_list.zh: 等于; 合计为; 计算; 估计

word_usage.usage: make作动词表“为某人准备/做...”，可用make sb. sth.或make sth. for sb.来表达。

make作动词时，表“使某人做某事”，可用make+宾语+动词不定式表达，此时动词不定式的to省去。但在被动结构中，动词前必须要加上to。
她被迫把整个情况又讲了一遍。
误 She was made repeat the whole story.
正 She was made to repeat the whole story.

make of和make from均表示“用...制成”，二者的区别在于，前者用于能看出原材料（物理变化）的情况，而后者不能。
这张桌子是木头做的。
误 The desk is made from wood.
正 The desk is made of wood.

make作动词时，可接由名词、形容词、动词不定式、过去分词或介词短语充当补足语的复合宾语。某些表示“感觉，认识”的动词，如understand, know等作宾语补足语时，常用其过去分词，宾语用反身代词。
他没有让别人明白他的意思。
误 He didn't make himself understand.
正 He didn't make himself understood.

make表“制造”时，make后接不定式表达中的to不可省。
示例：He made our shoes to last.
他把我们的鞋做的结实耐穿。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指音乐或诗歌、画的创作。
侧重创造出来的东西以前并不存在, 或者指独具特色的创作。
主要指在艺术或技术领域的创作设计, 强调构思多于实际制造。
主要用于科技领域, 指通过思考、研究或实验制造出新的前所未有、极为有用的东西。
最普通用词, 指任何东西的创作或制造。
正式用词, 侧重指使某事发生的原因。
普通用词, 指强迫或劝诱他人做某事。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使得(处于某种状态); 造成; 引起
实行; 作出某种举动
(make sure)确保; 保证; 确定

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 带来变革；发生变化；对某人(或某个环境)产生重大影响
结交；与...成为朋友；与...做朋友
达成交易；订个协议；做个交易

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 制造者；制作者；上帝；造物主
n. 制造；生产；收益；利润；素质；基本要素；纸和烟叶

word_family.mean: v. 做；制作；制造；建造；创造；使存在；使形成；带来；迫使做；组成；合计；共计；挣得；赚得；赶上；及时到达；朝…走去；求欢；诱奸；赢；涨；退

sense_info_list.zh: 使得(处于某种状态); 造成; 引起

examination_example.sentence: Overnight, Chicago reached a low of 21 degrees F Fahrenheit below zero, <highlight>making</highlight> it slightly colder than Antarctica (南极洲) , Alaska, and the North Pole.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一夜之间，芝加哥达到零下21华氏度，比南极洲、阿拉斯加和北极的温度还要低一些。

examination_example.sentence: Those who <highlight>made</highlight> breakfast the largest meal of the day were more likely to have a lower body mass index (BMI) than those who ate a large lunch or dinner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与吃了大量午餐或晚餐的人相比，那些把早餐作为一天中最f丰盛一餐的人更有可能拥有较低的身体质量指数(BMI)。

examination_example.sentence: You can <highlight>make</highlight> your taste buds active again by drinking water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以通过喝水让你的味蕾重新活跃起来。

examination_example.sentence: Michigan lawmakers have introduced legislation that could <highlight>make</highlight> their state the best place in the country to develop self-driving vehicles and put them on the road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 密歇根州的立法者已经提出立法，该立法可能会使他们的州成为该国开发自动驾驶汽车并将其投入使用的最佳地方。

examination_example.sentence: Lawmakers in Michigan clearly want to <highlight>make</highlight> the state ready for the commercial application of self-driving technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 密歇根州的立法者显然非常希望该州能为发展自动驾驶技术的商业化用途做好准备。

examination_example.sentence: Taking a trip underwater and exploring the inside of a sunken A300 would be quite an adventure, and that is exactly what Turkish authorities are hoping this attraction will <highlight>make</highlight> people think.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在水下旅行并探索沉没的 A300 飞机内部将是一次相当大的冒险行动，这正是土耳其当局希望这个景点能让人们想到的。

examination_example.sentence: Young adults with a college degree have fared much better in the labor market than their less-educated counterparts, which has in turn <highlight>made</highlight> it easier to establish their own households.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拥有大学学位的年轻人在劳动力市场上的表现远优于受教育程度较低的同龄人，这相应地使他们能更容易建立自己的家庭。

examination_example.sentence: Advances in AI will <highlight>make</highlight> human beings smarter, more able and "just better human beings".
examination_example.sentence_trans: AI的进步将使人类变得更聪明、更有能力，“只会是更好的人类”。

examination_example.sentence: Indra Nooky, PepsiCo chairman, said the plan to <highlight>make</highlight> its products healthier was important for the company's growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事公司董事长Indra Nooyi表示，让产品更健康的计划对公司的发展很重要。

examination_example.sentence: PepsiCo claims a packet of its chips now contains less salt than a slice of white bread. However, its new 10-year plan <highlight>makes</highlight> clear it believes it still has a long way to go.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事公司声称其一包薯片的含盐量现在比一片白面包还要少。但是，其新的10年计划明确表示，它相信自己还有很长的路要走。

examination_example.sentence: Studies have explored evidence that dietary changes can slow inflammation (炎症) , for example, or <highlight>make</highlight> the body inhospitable to cancer cells.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究已经找出证据，证明饮食结构的变化可以减缓炎症反应，比如，或者使人体不适用于癌细胞。

examination_example.sentence: "I try to <highlight>make</highlight> things as inexpensive as possible," said Hunt, who uses free digital textbooks for his classes but designs his own curriculum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亨特说：“我试图尽可能降低成本。”他在课堂上使用免费的数字教科书，但他设计了自己的课程。

examination_example.sentence: "There could be a number of reasons," he said, "for example, people do many things to <highlight>make</highlight> themselves happier: they strive for promotion or pay rises, or they get married.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说：“可能有很多原因，例如，人们做了很多令自己开心的事情：他们努力争取升职或加薪，或者结婚。”

examination_example.sentence: Explaining what the data revealed, he said: "What you see is that even after three years, mental health is still better, which is unlike many other things that we think will <highlight>make</highlight> us happy. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在解释数据揭示的内容时说：“你可以看到，即使三年后，(这些人的)心理健康状况仍然很好，这与我们所认为的，使人们感到高兴的其他许多事情不同。”

examination_example.sentence: So, these things are not sustainable; they don't <highlight>make</highlight> us happy in the long term.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，这些都是不可持续的; 长期来看，它们不会让我们快乐。

examination_example.sentence: The online systems may <highlight>make</highlight> my life a lot easier but I feel like I'm giving up control. The discussions are the things where my expertise can benefit the students most.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在线系统可能会让我的生活变得更轻松，但我觉得自己放弃了控制权。讨论是最能使我的专业知识让学生受益的地方。

examination_example.sentence: While two of these ships sank, they were all designed with double hulls (船体) believed to <highlight>make</highlight> them "unsinkable", perhaps a mistaken idea that led to the Titanic's and the Britannic's tragic end.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管其中两艘邮轮沉没了，但它们都采用了双船体设计，这种双船体被认为能使邮轮“永不沉没”，可能正是这个错误观念导致了泰坦尼克号和不列颠尼克号的惨痛结局。

sense_info_list.zh: 实行; 作出某种举动

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>make</highlight> these observations as research psychologists who have studied how schools and families can help young people thrive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们作为研究心理学家做出这些观察，研究学校和家庭如何帮助年轻人茁壮成长。

examination_example.sentence: They're convinced that whatever decision they <highlight>make</highlight> will be the wrong one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们坚信自己做出的任何决定都是错误的。

examination_example.sentence: I prefer to <highlight>make</highlight> a call if I'm in a hurry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有急事，我更喜欢打电话。

sense_info_list.en: form or put together out of material or parts

examination_example.sentence: They must be <highlight>made</highlight> from a rare material.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们一定是用稀有材料做的。

examination_example.sentence: It was <highlight>made</highlight> of shiny, bright pink plastic with a Little Mermaid sticker on the front.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是由亮粉色的塑料制成的，正面还贴有小美人鱼贴纸。

examination_example.sentence: Imagine that this drug were simple to <highlight>make</highlight>, safe to take, and could be had for free.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下，这种药制作简单，服用安全，还可以免费获得。

examination_example.sentence: Employers argue they <highlight>make</highlight> considerable savings on real estate when workers shift from office to home work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雇主们称，当员工从办公室转移到家庭工作时，他们可以在房地产上省下一大笔钱。

examination_example.sentence: How long will it take a typical household to <highlight>make</highlight> back the initial investment?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个平常的家庭需要多长时间才能收回初始投资？

examination_example.sentence: Never afraid to talk up his own accomplishments, a boastful Creme <highlight>made</highlight> a fortune as wealthy families with social ambitions invited him to their kitchens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从来不怕谈论自己的成就，当一个有社交野心的富裕家庭邀请他去厨房时，自夸的 Creme 发了大财。

sense_info_list.zh: (make sure)确保; 保证; 确定

examination_example.sentence: Just <highlight>make</highlight> sure you're logged in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请确定你已经登录。

examination_example.sentence: No matter what, <highlight>make</highlight> sure you are having fun in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论如何，确保你的生活充满乐趣。

examination_example.sentence: When there are several different assignments, <highlight>make</highlight> sure they begin with one they enjoy, so it seems easy to get started.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当有几个不同的任务时，先开始做喜欢的那个，这会让事情变得容易起来。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Made</highlight> up of a series of white skulls (颅骨) , the painting reminds drivers of the effect their pollution is having on the planet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这幅画由一系列白色头骨组成，提醒司机他们的污染正在对地球造成影响。

examination_example.sentence: Although women <highlight>make</highlight> up the majority of undergraduates in our universities, just under half of academic staff are female.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然女性占我国大学本科生的大多数，但只有不到一半的教职员工是女性。

examination_example.sentence: Only a quarter of professors are women, and black women <highlight>make</highlight> up less than 2 % of all female academic staff.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有四分之一的教授是女性，黑人女性在所有女性学术人员中所占比例不到2%。

sense_info_list.en: manage to reach or go to a place or position

examination_example.sentence: If someone is <highlight>making</highlight> up some conversation that might be interesting, it's probably not going to land well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有人编造了一些有趣的对话，可能不会有好结果。

examination_example.sentence: You think Jimmy's just <highlight>making</highlight> it all up?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你认为这一切都是吉米瞎编的?

examination_example.sentence: Kids derive important lessons from the chance to <highlight>make</highlight> things up as they go.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有机会顺其自然的话，孩子们会从中获得重要的经验教训。

examination_example.sentence: But what we forget about are the tens of thousands of people that tried and failed to <highlight>make</highlight> it in those challenging landscapes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是我们忘记了成千上万的人，他们试图在那些充满挑战的地方生存，但是失败了。

examination_example.sentence: These scientists, for reasons that are mostly arbitrary, either just missed getting a research grant or just barely <highlight>made</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些科学家，由于一些武断的原因，要么没有获得研究资助，要么勉强获得资助。

examination_example.sentence: And there it <highlight>makes</highlight> sense that failures show us the road to success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，失败指明成功之路的说法是有道理的。

examination_example.sentence: He damaged someone's car and wanted to get some money together to <highlight>make</highlight> up for the damage he'd caused.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他弄坏了别人的车，想凑点钱来弥补他造成的损失。

examination_example.sentence: "When people enter into that pattern thinking," says Kendall-Taylor, "it's cognitively comfortable to <highlight>make</highlight> sense of issues of poverty in that way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “当人们进入那种思维模式时，”肯德尔-泰勒说，“用那种方式来理解贫困问题，在认知上是很自然而然的。”

word_usage.usage:
make of和make from均表示“用...制成”，二者的区别在于，前者用于能看出原材料（物理变化）的情况，而后者不能。
这张桌子是木头做的。
误 The desk is made from wood.
正 The desk is made of wood.

make表“制造”时，make后接不定式表达中的to不可省。
示例：He made our shoes to last.
他把我们的鞋做的结实耐穿。
make作动词表“为某人准备/做...”，可用make sb. sth.或make sth. for sb.来表达。

make作动词时，表“使某人做某事”，可用make+宾语+动词不定式表达，此时动词不定式的to省去。但在被动结构中，动词前必须要加上to。
她被迫把整个情况又讲了一遍。
误 She was made repeat the whole story.
正 She was made to repeat the whole story.

make作动词时，可接由名词、形容词、动词不定式、过去分词或介词短语充当补足语的复合宾语。某些表示“感觉，认识”的动词，如understand, know等作宾语补足语时，常用其过去分词，宾语用反身代词。
他没有让别人明白他的意思。
误 He didn't make himself understand.
正 He didn't make himself understood.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指音乐或诗歌、画的创作。
侧重创造出来的东西以前并不存在，或者指独具特色的创作。
主要指在艺术或技术领域的创作设计，强调构思多于实际制造。
主要用于科技领域，指通过思考、研究或实验制造出新的前所未有、极为有用的东西。
最普通用词，指任何东西的创作或制造。
正式用词，侧重指使某事发生的原因。
普通用词，指强迫或劝诱他人做某事。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 挣得; 赚得; 获得
使产生; 引起; 导致

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 带来变革；发生变化；对某人(或某个环境)产生重大影响
组成；构成；化妆；编造；弥补
量入为出；勉强维持生计
理解；发现；起草；证明；过日子；搞性关系
预约；进行预约；预约挂号

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 制造者；制作者；上帝；造物主

word_family.mean: v. 做；制作；制造；建造；创造；使存在；使形成；带来；迫使做；组成；合计；共计；挣得；赚得；赶上；及时到达；朝…走去；求欢；诱奸；赢；涨；退

examination_example.sentence: They put some rice into a pot of water and left it to boil while they <highlight>made</highlight> the French toast.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把一些米饭放进一壶水中，煮沸它的同时，他们做了法式吐司。

examination_example.sentence: I wanted to <highlight>make</highlight> dumplings but found I had run out of flour, so I went out to buy some.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想包饺子，但发现面粉用完了，所以我出去买了一些。

examination_example.sentence: At first, I thought I knew everything and could <highlight>make</highlight> decisions by myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一开始我以为自己什么都懂，可以自己做决定。

examination_example.sentence: Studies show that a good sense of humor even <highlight>makes</highlight> you seem smarter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明，良好的幽默感甚至会使你看起来更聪明。

examination_example.sentence: The dark-colored road surface <highlight>makes</highlight> the youngsters hard to be noticed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 深色的路面使年轻人很难被注意到。

examination_example.sentence: He found that science amazed Times' readers and <highlight>made</highlight> them want to share this positive feeling with others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他发现，科学让《纽约时报》的读者感到惊讶，并让他们想要与他人分享这种积极的感觉。

examination_example.sentence: He said he would <highlight>make</highlight> sure that the company cut its use of plastic straws in half.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说他会确保公司减少一半塑料吸管的使用。

examination_example.sentence: Before you open the book, <highlight>make</highlight> sure that you are comfortable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你打开这本书之前，确保你感到舒服。

examination_example.sentence: Every day he <highlight>makes</highlight> sure that fresh vegetables and high quality oil are used for cooking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天他都确保用新鲜的蔬菜和高质量的油来烹饪。

examination_example.sentence: Even the most successful public speaker will <highlight>make</highlight> mistakes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使是最成功的演说家也会犯错。

examination_example.sentence: So, don't stop speaking when you <highlight>make</highlight> a mistake unless it's a truly serious one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，当你犯错误时不要停止说话，除非是真正严重的错误。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>make</highlight> an appointment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 预约。

examination_example.sentence: I'd like to <highlight>make</highlight> an appointment to see him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想要预约去见他。

examination_example.sentence: In the beginning, I dared myself to <highlight>make</highlight> a difference in the life of another person.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一开始，我鼓励自己去改变另一个人的生活。

examination_example.sentence: I have been following the habit to this day, not <highlight>making</highlight> or accepting many excuses for not writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到今天，我一直遵循着这个习惯，没有为不写作找借口，或者是接受借口。

examination_example.sentence: As writer Caroline Alexander <highlight>makes</highlight> clear in her forceful and well-researched story The Endurance, adventuring was even then a thoroughly commercial effort.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如作家Caroline Alexander在她有力的、经过充分研究的故事《耐力》中明确指出的那样，即使在当时，冒险也是一项彻底的商业努力。

sense_info_list.zh: 挣得; 赚得; 获得
使产生; 引起; 导致

word_usage.usage: 和表示动作的名词连用，表动作或活动：make a promise ( visit, comparison, suggestion, proposal, decision, an announcement, an apology, no answer...); make preparations ( repairs, experiments...)。
也可和其他一些名词连用，表示动作：make a speech发表演讲make a mistake犯错误make a joke开玩笑make an effort努力make progress取得进步

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使存在; 使形成; 带来; 做出
(make up)化妆; 构成; 编造; 补偿

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 带来变革；发生变化；对某人(或某个环境)产生重大影响
组成；构成；化妆；编造；弥补
作决定；决定；下定决心做
人多好办事；众人拾柴火焰高
（经历艰难困苦后）成功；(及时)到达
把…做成；把…转变为；使成为
可以制成；被制成；把...制成
在...取得成绩；在...做出成就
做出巨大努力；巨大的努力；十分努力
使可能；使变得可能；使有可能
开个玩笑；说笑话；开玩笑
做出允诺；许了诺言；做出承诺
发声；弄出响声；郑重声明
编理由；找借口；找个藉口
做晚饭；做晚餐；准备晚餐
让某人做某事；使某人干某事

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 制造者；制作者；上帝；造物主
n. 制造；生产；收益；利润；素质；基本要素；纸和烟叶

word_family.mean: v. 做；制作；制造；建造；创造；使存在；使形成；带来；迫使做；组成；合计；共计；挣得；赚得；赶上；及时到达；朝…走去；求欢；诱奸；赢；涨；退

sense_info_list.zh: 使存在; 使形成; 带来; 做出

examination_example.sentence: Yesterday our headmaster <highlight>made</highlight> a speech on environmental protection, and we learned something about recycling of waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 昨天我们校长做了一个关于环境保护的演讲，我们学到了一些关于废物回收的知识。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays, plenty of women around the world are doing great things and <highlight>making</highlight> a difference.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，世界各地很多女性都在做着伟大的事情，改变世界。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>make</highlight> China own an important and even top position in the history of human civilization (文明).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们使中国在人类文明史上占有重要甚至至高无上的地位。

examination_example.sentence: Pop music can <highlight>make</highlight> people feel happy and comfortable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 流行音乐能使人感到快乐和舒适。

examination_example.sentence: A good relationship with your parents can <highlight>make</highlight> you a better and happier person.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和父母的良好关系可以让你成为一个更好、更幸福的人。

sense_info_list.en: form or put together out of material or parts

examination_example.sentence: Different languages may have different ways to <highlight>make</highlight> idioms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不同的语言可能会有不同的方法来创造习语。

examination_example.sentence: When the windmills spin, they <highlight>make</highlight> electricity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当风车旋转时，它们发电。

examination_example.sentence: The first cartoon film with sound and music was <highlight>made</highlight> in New York in 1928.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一个有声音、有音乐的电影于1928年在纽约被拍成。

examination_example.sentence: Many people near the door were stronger than him but he still <highlight>made</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 门口的许多人都比他强壮，但他还是成功了。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>made</highlight> it through those years and finally went on to a music school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我熬过了那些年并最终进入了一所音乐学校。

sense_info_list.zh: (make up)化妆; 构成; 编造; 补偿

examination_example.sentence: He enjoyed telling the boys stories and <highlight>made</highlight> up the character of Peter Pan to bring them pleasure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他喜欢给孩子们讲故事，并虚构了彼得·潘这个角色来给他们带来快乐。

examination_example.sentence: The Yangtze River Economic Zone covers eleven provinces and cities, <highlight>making</highlight> up about forty percent of China's total population and GDP.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 长江经济区覆盖11个省市，约占中国总人口和GDP的40%。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Making</highlight> Iron into a Needle
examination_example.sentence_trans: 铁杵磨成针

word_usage.usage: make作动词表“为某人准备/做...”，可用make sb. sth.或make sth. for sb.来表达。

make sb. do sth.意为“使某人做某事”，此时要用省略to的动词不定式；但在被动结构中，动词前必须要加上to。例如：
1. 在我出去之前，我爸妈总是要我写家庭作业。
My parents always make me do my homework before I go out.
2. 她被迫把整个情况又讲了一遍。
She was made to repeat the whole story.

make of和make from均表示“用...制成”，二者的区别在于，前者用于能看出原材料（物理变化）的情况，而后者不能。
这张桌子是木头做的。
误 The desk is made from wood.
正 The desk is made of wood.

make作动词时，可接由名词、形容词、动词不定式、过去分词或介词短语充当补足语的复合宾语。某些表示“感觉，认识”的动词，如understand, know等作宾语补足语时，常用其过去分词，宾语用反身代词。
他没有让别人明白他的意思。
误 He didn't make himself understand.
正 He didn't make himself understood.

make表“制造”时，make后接不定式表达中的to不可省。
示例：He made our shoes to last.
他把我们的鞋做的结实耐穿。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指创造出以前并不存在的新事物，或指独具特色的创作。
主要用于科技领域，指通过思考、研究或实验，制造出前所未有之物。
普通用词，指任何东西的创作或制造。
指生产产品，或创作作品。
普通用词，很常用，含义广，既可指制造具体的东西，也可指完成一种行为。
普通用词，侧重大量地生产出各种生产用品和生活用品。强调结果。也用于引申。
